}} ===Info=== ====cat /proc/mtd====

mtd0: 00040000 00010000 "Bootloader"
mtd1: 003b0000 00010000 "Kernel"
mtd2: 0030db9c 00010000 "Rootfs"
mtd3: 00010000 00010000 "nvram"
